title: Custom Dog Name t-shirt, Dog Mom t-shirt, Dog Lover t-shirt, Dog People t-shirt, New Dog Owner t-shirt, Pet Lover t-shirt
description:

This stylish personalized (with your pets name) t-shirt, is a chic addition to any aesthetic and is sure to spark conversations. Whether for yourself or as a thoughtful gift for another dog lover, or even as a beautiful memorial tribute, this lovingly crafted pet t-shirt is available in various sizes and hues to suit every taste.
This classic unisex jersey short sleeve tee fits like a well-loved favorite. Soft cotton and quality print make users fall in love with it over and over again. These t-shirts have-ribbed knit collars to bolster shaping. The shoulders are tapered for a better fit over time. Dual side seams hold the garment's shape for longer.
-Made with 100% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, a lightweight fabric (4.2 oz/yd¬≤ (142 g/m¬≤)) that is easy to layer, breathable. Perfect for active and leisure wear.
-The retail fit that is perfect for casual and semi-formal settings. The crew neckline adds a classic, neat style that's perfect for accessorizing.
-Bella+Canvas manufactures all its products in the US and internationally in humane, no-sweat-shop, sustainable way and is part of the Fair Labor Association as well as Platinum WRAP certified.
-The tear-away label minimizes skin irritations.
-Fabric blends: Ash and Heather Prism colors - 99% Airlume combed and ring-spun cotton, 1% polyester; Heather colors - 52% cotton, 48% polyester; Athletic Heather and Black Heather - 90% cotton, 10% polyester.

title: Anglers Paradise Ocean Waves t shirt, Deep sea fishing jersey, Sports Fishing shirt,Ocean life tee,Saltwater fish, Marlin fish, Nautical tee
description:
Anglers Paradise Ocean Waves t shirt, Deep sea fishing jersey, Sports Fishing shirt,Ocean life tee,Saltwater fish, Marlin fish, Nautical tee.

Hi, welcome to our store! We offer a variety of soft comfortable graphic shirts in a unique and stylish design. Here is some information to help you with the ordering process.

HOW TO ORDER
1. Select the shirt and styles from the drop down menus above.
2. Select the quantity
3. Click ADD TO CART, if you want more than one, please go back to listing and repeat the process.
4. go to CART and place your order.

** If you want a custom design or different size, please let us know.
** Please double check your order before checkout, because these are a custom orders and not returnable, once in
production.
** If you have any questions please send us a message.

SHIRT SIZING AND MATERIAL
Sizing:
All shirts are unisex sizing. I recommend WOMEN TO SIZE DOWN ONE SIZE, but it is important to check out the size charts to
compare to favorite shirts you already have, as different brands of shirts come in a variety of size standards. Shirts may have
up to to a +/- variance when compared with the measurements on the sizing chart. This is pretty standard for the clothing
industry. This is not a fitted shirt and may be looser in some areas.
Material:
This classic unisex jersey short sleeve tee fits like a well-loved favorite. These soft lightweight cotton t-shirts have-ribbed knit
collars to bolster shaping. The shoulders have taping for better fit over time. Dual side seams hold the garment's shape for
longer.
.: 100% Airlume combed and ringspun cotton (fiber content may vary for different colors)
.: Light fabric (4.2 oz/yd¬≤ (142 g/m¬≤))
.: Relaxed fit
.: Tear away label and runs true to size

**Sweatshirts and Hoodies are usually Gildan medium weight 50/50
**Color "Heather" can be 50/50 polyester/cotton

CARE INSTRUCTIONS:
-Machine wash warm, inside out, and with like colors
-Tumble dry low
-medium iron (do not iron design)
-do not bleach
-do not dry clean

SHIPPING AND HANDLING:
-Handling/Processing: 1-2 business days
-First Class Mail: 2-5 business days
*can take longer for custom, out of order materials, and approaching holidays

RETURN POLICY
Unfortunately since you purchase is made to order we do not accept returns or exchanges unless the item is defective or
different form what you ordered (please make sure address is correct). So please let us know about any issues.

Thank you for your order!

title: The Suryoye Legacy Unisex T-Shirt
description:
Embrace Your Heritage with Elegance: The Suryoye Legacy T-Shirt In a world where roots are everything, and culture is the soul's language, it brings you more than just a garment; it's a statement of resilience, unity, and pride. This pure white, cotton t-shirt, adorned with our iconic logo in bold black‚Äîfeaturing minimalist text and a poignant cross‚Äîspeaks volumes of a heritage that thrives beyond borders. Crafted for both men and women of Aramaic descent, aged 14 to 60 or older, our t-shirt transcends age, embodying the spirit of a people dispersed yet undivided. It's a modern tribute to our heritage, the only legacy we carry in the absence of a homeland.
The Suryoye Legacy T-shirt isn‚Äôt just apparel; it's a new dawn for the Aramaic culture, a symbol that unites us all, wherever we are in the world.
Be unique. Be culture. Be Suryoyo.

title: Unisex Heavy Cotton Tee Titanic
description:
The unisex heavy cotton tee is the basic staple of any wardrobe. It is the foundation upon which casual fashion grows. All it needs is a personalized design to elevate things to profitability. The specially spun fibers provide a smooth surface for premium printing vividity and sharpness. No side seams mean there are no itchy interruptions under the arms. The shoulders have tape for improved durability.
.: Made with medium fabric (5.3 oz/yd¬≤ (180 g/m¬≤)) consisting of 100% cotton for year-round comfort that is sustainable and highly durable.
.: The classic fit of this shirt ensures a comfy, relaxed wear while the crew neckline adds that neat, timeless look that can blend into any occasion, casual or semi-formal.
.: The tear-away label means a scratch-free experience with no irritation or discomfort whatsoever.
.: Made using 100% US cotton that is ethically grown and harvested. Gildan is also a proud member of the US Cotton Trust Protocol ensuring ethical and sustainable means of production. This blank tee is certified by Oeko-Tex for safety and quality assurance.
